Title: Ejaculation
Writer: Nick Kroll (created by), Andrew Goldberg (created by), Mark Levin (created by), Jennifer Flackett (created by), Nick Kroll, Andrew Goldberg, Duffy Boudreau (staff writer), Mark Levin, Jak Knight (staff writer), Victor Quinaz (staff writer), Jennifer Flackett
Actors: Emily Altman, Fred Armisen, Neil Casey, Richard Kind
Plot: As Andrew falls under the spell of the randy Hormone Monster, his buddy Nick becomes obsessed with the lack of changes in his own body.
